an-email-have-sent-to-you-please-check-y: An email has been sent to you. Please check your inbox.
bind-email-hint: Bind an email to keep your progress and claim the reward.
email-binding-sent: Verification email sent. Please confirm to finish binding.
delete-account-warning: Deleting your account is permanent and cannot be undone.
error-super-admin-cannot-delete-account: You are the super admin of a player network. Transfer ownership before deleting your account.
error-missing-email: Missing email. Unable to create account.
guest-bind-prompt-body: You are playing as a guest. Bind an email in Settings to avoid losing progress.
this-login-link-is-invalid-or-expired-pl: This login link is invalid or expired. Please login again.
cannot-connect-to-firebase-check-your-in: Cannot connect to Firebase. Check your internet connection or firewall configuration(For China Mainland User).
username-must-be-3-20-chars-and-alphanum: Username must be 3-20 characters long and alphanumeric.
failed-to-set-username-please-try-again: Failed to set username, please try again.
please-set-an-username-you-can-change-it: Please set an username (you can also change it later)
confirm-name-and-enter-terminal-ark: Confirm Name and Enter Terminal Ark
memory-and-cache-rules: Memory is a common token, typically dropped in stages. Cache is a higher-tier token, usually obtained from high-level stages, missions, or market trades.
the-only-uncorrupted-haven-in-the-pollut: The only uncorrupted haven in the polluted datastream.
memory-converter-lore: When sync reaches its limit, residue builds up. Hand it to me and I will extract usable stabilizers.
residual-sync-empty: No Residual Sync available for extraction.
error-neural-sync-full: Neural Sync is full; recovery items cannot be used.
error-neural-sync-overflow: Cannot use this item because it would exceed the Neural Sync cap.
neural-link-stabilizer-regen5: Neural Link Stabilizer – Clinical Supply Model
neural-link-stabilizer-regen5-lore: This product is a medical pipeline version supplied by the NUTA Human Laboratory under NHTA clinical standards. It uses the official model’s core formula, then undergoes multiple high-ratio saline dilutions and stabilization before encapsulation, keeping active ingredients within a controlled low-dose range. It can briefly assist cortical signal conduction and temporarily stabilize mildly imbalanced neural-link waveforms, and may be used as a prescription drug. [Consumable] Restores 5 Neural Sync immediately.
go-to-terminal-arks-lower-deck: Go to Terminal Ark’s Lower Deck
view-your-networks-home-page: View Your Terminal User Network's Home Page
view-more-options-such-as-friend-list-se: View more options such as friend list, settings, and so on
title: Title
neutral-units-do-not-gain-or-receive-any: Neutral units do not gain or receive any gang-based damage modifiers. (Deals 100% damage to all gangs.)
urban-legion-deals-120-percent-damage-to: Urban Legion deals 120% damage to Underground Syndicate, but only deals 80% damage to Ancient Tech Remnant.
underground-syndicate-deals-120-percent-: Underground Syndicate deals 120% damage to Ancient Tech Remnant, but only deals 80% damage to Urban Legion.
ancient-tech-remnant-deals-120-percent-d: Ancient Tech Remnant deals 120% damage to Urban Legion, but only deals 80% damage to Underground Syndicate.
remove-agent-warning: Removing the agent will cancel orders exceeding base slots without material refund. Continue?
tap-to-select: Tap here to select a hero...
hero-upgrade-core-lore: Consumable that Grants a Huge Amount of EXP to a Hero
error-missing-authorization: Missing authorization header. Please log in again.
error-invalid-user-session: Invalid user session. Please log in again.
error-unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
error-invalid-username-format: Invalid username format. Please enter 1–16 alphanumeric characters.
error-update-failed: Failed to update username. Please try again later.
error-update-inventory-failed: Failed to update item lock status.
error-missing-hero-or-item: Missing heroId or itemId in request.
error-hero-dead: This hero is down and cannot be healed.
error-item-not-equippable: Item not found or not equippable.
error-item-used-this-layer: An item has already been used this layer.
error-user-not-in-dungeon: You are not in this dungeon.
error-upper-armor-exists: Hero already has upper armor equipped.
error-lower-armor-exists: Hero already has lower armor equipped.
error-item-not-equipped: This item is not currently equipped to the hero.
error-auth-missing: Missing authorization header. Please log in again.
error-auth-invalid-user: Invalid user session. Please log in again.
error-request-invalid-body: Invalid request body. Check heroId and coreAmount.
error-hero-template-missing: Failed to load hero templates. Please try again later.
error-hero-already-max-level: The hero is already at max level.
error-hero-exceed-max-level: Level up would exceed level 60 limit.
error-hero-level-exceed-player-level: Hero level cannot exceed player's current level.
please-notice-that-your-hero-upgrade-cor: Please notice that your hero upgrade core is locked and cannot be used.
please-click-on-the-equipment-you-want-t: Please click on the equipment you want to equip
no-signal-tuner: No signal tuner available in your inventory.
do-you-really-want-to-clear-chat-cache-p: Do you really want to clear chat cache? Please use this feature only when chat system is not working properly.
do-you-really-want-to-disconnect-to-term: Do you really want to disconnect from Terminal Ark?
type-your-message-in-the-textbox-and-pre: Type your message in the textbox and press Send to send your message. Markdown is supported. If you want to mention someone, use #mention# followed by their UID and end with a #. Also, or just click their username to quick mention.
report-user-description: Describe the report and context. This will be sent as a private message.
private-chat-description: Send a private message to this user.
error-no-items-selected: Please select at least one item
mention-this-user-in-your-message: Mention this user in your message
error-storage-quota-exceeded: Storage quota exceeded. Please replace or remove old files.
equipped-item-notice: This item is equipped and cannot be locked or destroyed. Unequip it first to perform these actions.
reply-here-maximum-is-512-words-markdown: Reply here (maximum is 512 words, markdown supported)
how-to-start-a-new-chat: How to Start a New Chat
how-to-start-a-new-chat-description: Navigate to ChatNet Tab, and click the user you want to chat to, then select send private chat.
signal-hijack-system-lore: Hack into Terminal Ark's backbone network and parse captured data to gain new data access rights.
signal-hijack-system-lore-encrypted: In its latest council meeting, Terminal Ark introduced a new encrypted communication protocol. Within it lies access to the most recent and top-secret information.
signal-hijack-system-lore-standard: The local government of Terminal Ark still relies on an outdated communication protocol, making it easy to intercept information — but extremely difficult to access the most up-to-date data.
common-decoder-lore: A widely circulated decoding device found on the black market. It can be used in the Signal Hijack System to attempt decryption of the Standard Channel.
signal-tracer-lore: An enhanced decryption chip, refined by ancient tech remnants from high-grade black market prototypes. It possesses immense computational power, capable of deciphering the latest encryption protocols. Use it in the Signal Hijack System to attempt retrieval of high-tier classified data.
encrypted-fragment-lore: The damaged remains of a decryption chip, left behind after signal channel decoding. Though no longer functional, certain black market merchants are rumored to possess the means to repair and repurpose it.
protocol-summary: SUMMARY :: total {{total}} | C {{common}} / R {{rare}} / L {{legendary}} / E {{epic}}
do-you-want-to-gacha-the-encrypted-chann: Do you want to gacha the Encrypted Channel 1 time?
Do you want to gacha the Encrypted Channel 10 times?
do-you-want-to-gacha-the-standard-channe: Do you want to gacha the Standard Channel 1 time?
Do you want to gacha the Standard Channel 10 times?
locked-epic-package-lore: A locked epic package that must be unlocked at the Crafting Station, containing extremely rare resources and gear.
locked-legendary-package-lore: A locked legendary package that requires unlocking at the Crafting Station, containing rare materials and powerful gear.
locked-rare-package-lore: A locked rare package that must be unlocked at the Crafting Station, containing useful resources and gear.
locked-common-package-lore: A locked common package that must be unlocked at the Crafting Station, containing basic resources and gear.
epic-upper-armor-blueprint-lore: An epic upper armor blueprint used to craft unparalleled upper body armor.
epic-lower-armor-blueprint-lore: An epic lower armor blueprint used to forge lower body armor with ultimate defense and agility.
epic-upgrade-module-blueprint-lore: An epic upgrade module blueprint used to craft enhancement modules that greatly boost gear performance.
legendary-upper-armor-blueprint-lore: A legendary upper armor blueprint used to craft upper body armor of glory and strength.
legendary-lower-armor-blueprint-lore: A legendary lower armor blueprint used to forge lower body armor balancing defense and agility.
legendary-upgrade-module-blueprint-lore: A legendary upgrade module blueprint used to craft enhancement modules that push gear to its peak.
rare-upper-armor-blueprint-lore: A rare upper armor blueprint used to craft upper body armor with improved protection.
rare-lower-armor-blueprint-lore: A rare lower armor blueprint used to forge practical and agile lower body armor.
rare-upgrade-module-blueprint-lore: A rare upgrade module blueprint used to craft modules that provide steady enhancement.
common-upper-armor-blueprint-lore: A common upper armor blueprint used to craft upper body armor for basic protection.
common-lower-armor-blueprint-lore: A common lower armor blueprint used to forge lower body armor for basic defense.
common-upgrade-module-blueprint-lore: A common upgrade module blueprint used to craft modules with basic enhancement functions.
broken-upper-armor-blueprint-lore: A broken upper armor blueprint, though damaged, can still be used to craft upper body armor with limited protection.
broken-lower-armor-blueprint-lore: A broken lower armor blueprint used to forge lower body armor with fragile structure.
broken-upgrade-module-blueprint-lore: A broken upgrade module blueprint with incomplete functions, offering only minimal enhancement.
common-hero-memory-fragment-lore: Common hero memory fragment, containing scattered battle memories that may awaken part of a hero’s power.
rare-hero-memory-fragment-lore: Rare hero memory fragment, holding clearer battle memories that significantly enhance hero attunement.
legendary-hero-memory-fragment-lore: Legendary hero memory fragment, crystallizing the glorious moments of a hero’s career, imbued with unmatched power.
epic-hero-memory-fragment-lore: Epic hero memory fragment, carrying memories that transcend time, allowing a hero to relive their peak.
overclocking-pass-15min-lore: A rare, dedicated Tensor processor capable of booting up to 15 minutes of overclocking.
overclocking-pass-30min-lore: A legendary, dedicated Tensor processor capable of booting up to 30 minutes of overclocking.
browser-open-confirmation: Are you sure you want to open this webpage in the Terminal Browser?
check-in-hint: Check in daily to earn rewards. Day 7 grants an extra bonus.
check-in-success: Check-in complete. Rewards sent to your items inbox.
error-check-in-already-claimed: You have already checked in today.
error-fetch-neural-sync-rules-failed: Failed to load neural sync rules.
error-feedback-empty: No messages yet. Use the form below to report an issue.
destroy-selected-items-text: Do you really want to destroy the selected items? You will receive the salvage based on destroy rules.
destroy-all-items-text: Do you really want to delete this inventory? You will permanently lose all items inside and receive no salvage.
how-many-times-do-you-want-to-repeat: How many times do you want to repeat?
you-had-received-free-overclocking-from-: You had received free Overclocking from the community
you-had-used-overclocking-for-the-commun: You had used Overclocking for the community
overclocking-makes-your-afk-finish-insta: Overclocking makes your AFK finish instantly
overclocking-applies-to-all-players-curr: Overclocking applies to all players currently AFK on the server.
overclocking-stack-limit-exceeded: Overclocking stack limit exceeded! Maximum 32 stacks (480 minutes / 8 hours) per operation.
synaptic-accelerator-lore: An experimental device from National University of Terminal Ark  that enhances synaptic transmission, greatly reducing idle inefficiency. Reduces AFK time by 40% for 20 minutes. Stackable, up to 80%.
frontal-cortex-optimizer-lore: The latest innovation from National University of Terminal Ark, optimizing neural pathways to improve cognitive synchronization. Increases EXP gain by 20% for 20 minutes. Stackable, up to 40%.
legendary-radio-signal-jammer-lore: A top-secret prototype from National University of Terminal Ark, never meant to leave the lab. Grants +3% chance to obtain 4-star tier items/heroes from the “Signal Hijacking System” in the “Standard Channel” for 3 minutes. Cannot be stacked.
epic-radio-signal-jammer-lore: A highly classified device mysteriously leaked from the lab, now circulating in underground markets. Grants +1% chance to obtain 4-star tier items/heroes from the “Signal Hijacking System” in the “Encrypted Channel” for 2 minutes. Cannot be stacked.
high-frequency-computing-core-loader-lor: By hacking into the Terminal Ark Central Neuro-Computer and bypassing integrity checks, computation units are replaced with high-frequency cores. Increases Memory acquisition efficiency by 20% for 20 minutes. Stackable, up to 60%.
advanced-neural-connection-synchronizati: Enhances synchronization with the Terminal Ark neural network, improving overall drop efficiency. Increases all item drop rates by 1.5% for 1 minute. Stackable, up to 3%.
abort-afk-text: Do you really want to abort this AFK? You will lose all items already consumed in this AFK.
currency-memory-lore: Memory is a common currency in Terminal Ark, typically dropped in stages.
currency-cache-lore: Cache is a high-tier currency, usually obtained by AFK farming in the Memory Converter, where 1024 units of Memory can be converted into 1 unit of Cache, or by completing high-level stages.
you-have-new-system-inventory: You have new system inventory to claim.
black-market-lore: The Black Market... it's the kind of place where, if you can pay the price, you can buy anything—even your life.
black-market-long-lore: In the deepest layer of Terminal Ark, within shadows untouched by the lights of civilization, lies an unrecorded street. There are no official signposts here—only flickering neon and corroded metal markers guiding those 'in the know' inside.
how-many-do-you-want-to-buy: How many do you want to buy?
molecular-assembler-lore: The Molecular Assembler, developed by NUTA, can turn blueprints and Memory into equipment—armor, weapons, even rare gear.
molecular-assembler-long-lore: The Molecular Assembler, developed by the Molecular Research Lab of National University of Terminal Ark (NUTA), is a weapon fabrication device that fuses nanoscale molecular reconstruction with arcane energy matrices. By following a blueprint, it builds matter layer by layer, powered by memory credits that fuel both computation and energy expenditure, ultimately transforming conceptual designs into tangible armaments—shifting weapon production from traditional workshops to a system of data and resource equivalence.
crafting-station-lore: This is the Crafting Station. Feed it the right commands and resources, and it will unlock containers, tune signals, even assemble entire module clusters.
crafting-station-long-lore: The Crafting Station within NUTA’s Natural Science Laboratory is a concealed yet perilous technological core, using quantum tuning and lattice-memory arrays to unlock encrypted containers, reconstruct communication protocols, and synthesize module clusters; in the dim light, mechanical arms and flickering datastreams intertwine, making it feel as much a research instrument as a dormant weapons factory, where knowledge itself is reshaped into the boundary between power and threat.
tech-scrap-lore: The remains of destroyed items may have other uses in the crafting station.
destroy-item-text: Do you really want to destroy this item(s)?
destroy-equipment-warning: Equipment can only be destroyed individually, and once destroyed, it cannot be recovered!
neural-network-adapter-lore: The Neural Network Adapter is one of humanity’s final technological marvels. By linking fragments of consciousness into the city’s neural web, users can engage in simulated battles without setting foot on the battlefield.
hash-processor-lore: The Hash Processor is a device designed to run parallel computations within the city’s neural network. By continuously hashing data, a user’s consciousness contributes to network maintenance and encryption tasks while offline, earning the basic currency known as Memory.
network-node-key-user-network-lore: The Network Node Key (End User Network) is a unique access token that links one’s consciousness to a player’s private neural network. While offline, it allows members to share resources and earn minor loot.
neural-link-stabilizer-regen60-lore: A high-grade neural intervention compound developed by NUTA Human Laboratory. It directly targets critical regions of the cerebral cortex, temporarily boosts electrical signal transmission, and forcibly stabilizes chaotic neural link waveforms. Originally designed for emergency neural synchronization recovery. Due to its deep intervention level, long-term neurological impacts remain insufficiently studied. Side effects are not fully understood; frequent or prolonged use is not recommended. [Consumable] Restores 60 Neural Synchronization immediately.
neural-link-stabilizer-regen20-lore: A test sample released by NUTA Human Laboratory, produced with the same formula as the full model but with greatly reduced dosage and depth of action. It briefly enhances cortical signal conduction and helps correct unstable neural link waveforms as an emergency synchronization adjustment. Although the risk is lower, it remains an experimental product that directly interferes with neural activity. Side effects are still under observation; use only when necessary. [Consumable] Restores 20 Neural Synchronization immediately.
signal-tuner-hub-long-lore: The Signal Tuner Hub, located in the NUTA Affiliated General Hospital, is a medical synthesizer that employs neural signal calibration and bio-electronic reconstruction to transform fragmented data and raw materials into highly efficient healing devices, making it an indispensable element of the city’s medical infrastructure.
broken-signal-tuner-lore: A signal tuner commonly found on the Lower Deck, Circulating among refugees, easy to obtain but with poor performance. Still provides a minor boost to a hero’s link stability. [Medical Item] Restores +64 HP.
common-signal-tuner-lore: A basic model signal tuner. With simple calibration, it maintains stable output—modest, yet reliable for everyday use. [Medical Item] Restores +128 HP.
rare-signal-tuner-lore: A rare tuner manufactured in certified factories. With high signal purity, it effectively enhances neural link stability. [Medical Item] Restores +256 HP.
legendary-signal-tuner-lore: A legendary piece of medical equipment, said to originate from a lost laboratory. Its performance far surpasses conventional models, capable of turning the tide in dire moments. [Medical Item] Restores +512 HP.
epic-signal-tuner-lore: An exceptionally rare pinnacle of technology, seen only by the fortunate few. Its tuning effect is nearly flawless, granting heroes astonishing restorative power. [Medical Item] Restores +1024 HP.
store-memory-text: How much Memory do you want to store in?
store-cache-text: How much Cache do you want to store in?
withdraw-memory-text: How much Memory do you want to withdraw?
withdraw-cache-text: How much Cache do you want to withdraw?
click-on-the-item-you-want-to-store-in: Click on the item you want to store in
click-on-the-item-you-want-to-withdraw: Click on the item you want to withdraw
brand-new-parts-lore: Discarded factory stock from the old era—unused yet still valuable. When dismantled, they yield more tech scrap than medical technology parts, but their unstable origins make the conversion less reliable.
data-vault-long-lore: The Vault is an extension of the National Bank of Terminal Ark’s (NBTA) core data center, designed for the secure storage and retrieval of digital currency and items. Through dedicated encrypted channels, all stored data is mirrored across multiple nodes, ensuring stability even during network fluctuations. As authorization levels increase, the Vault’s capacity expands, also upgrading the carry limit of personal inventories, allowing every operation to begin with greater preparedness.
data-vault-lore: Store it in the Vault—it’s safer than your own head. Upgrade it, and even your terminal's storage grows larger.
data-vault-upgrade-loot-lore: According to the NBTA’s announcement, upgrading backpack slots to 64 grants the title 'Junior Collector', 96 grants 'Intermediate Collector', 128 grants 'Senior Collector', and reaching 196 (the maximum) grants the title 'Epic Collector'.
lower-deck-lore: Don’t head down to the Lower Decks… unless you’re ready to share company with rats, black markets, and broken lives.
lower-deck-long-lore: The Lower Decks form the bottommost dwelling of Terminal Ark, where sunlight never reaches and rusted steel girders intertwine with decaying pipelines to create a labyrinth of gloom. It is home to the city’s lower class, absent of neon splendor and filled instead with damp air and the ceaseless hum of machinery. Survival here depends on cheap energy, scavenged parts, and unstable black market deals, while the stench of mold and corroded metal lingers permanently in the air. For those above, it is merely the city’s shadow—for those below, it is home.
working-at-the-molecular-assembler-cente: Working at the Molecular Assembler Center
Gain Printing Experiences by AFKing Here.
hacking-neural-networks-lore: Hacking neural networks and using distributed computing power to mine cryptocurrencies. Need Hash Processors.
some-changes-need-reload-to-apply: Some Changes Need Reload to Apply
station-adventure-lore: Take a light-speed train and go on adventures around the world.
vicinity-of-the-terminal-ark-expedition: Vicinity of the Terminal Ark Expedition
encampment-of-the-solaris-rising-vanguar: Encampment of the Solaris Rising Vanguard
ruins-of-the-ancient-human-settlement: Ruins of the Ancient Human Settlement
lower-deck-outskirts-terminal-ark-lore: This is the outermost ruin of the Terminal Ark’s lower deck, a place of utter decay. Those who dwell here brush against death every single day.
protected-zone-edge-terminal-ark-lore: Beyond lies the edge of the radiation protection zone. This overexploited planet has long withered, and without protective gear, survival in the wasteland is impossible.
endless-plains-lore: These are the endless plains beyond the Terminal Ark, a desolate expanse where no trace of life can be found.
vicinity-of-the-terminal-ark-expedition-: The expedition still toils within the irradiated wastelands, enduring hardship for wages so meager they verge on insult.
encampment-of-the-solaris-rising-vanguar: This is the encampment of the Solaris Rising Vanguard. It’s best not to get entangled with these cybernetic fanatics.
ruins-of-the-ancient-human-settlement-lo: So this is where the ancients once lived.
forgotten-space-station-ruins-lore: These are the remains of a long-decommissioned space station, once a beacon of civilization, now reduced to silent fragments.
ruins-of-nutas-ai-laboratory-lore: The ruins of the National Terminal University’s AI Laboratory. Once, humanity fought for the future here—now, only desolation and bones remain.
your-level-is-too-low-to-access-this-are: Your level is too low to access this area
colony-no-6-of-the-forgotten-link-city: Colony No.6 of the Forgotten Link City
an-illegal-gathering-place-for-severely-: An Illegal Gathering Place for Severely Irradiated Modified Humans
enemy-colony-targeted-by-annihilation-mi: Enemy Colony Targeted by Annihilation Missiles
beside-the-commander-about-to-dispatch-a: Beside the Commander About to Dispatch a War Report to the National Assembly
refugee-camp-on-the-edge-of-the-protecte: Refugee Camp on the Edge of the Protected Zone
wreckage-of-the-starship-that-never-retu: Wreckage of the Starship That Never Returned
the-resting-place-of-a-researcher-who-he: The Resting Place of a Researcher Who Held Fast to the Law of AI Relations
accessing-neural-networks-lore: Use the Neural Network Adapter to access this area’s neural network and enter AFK mode. When the AFK session ends, you will receive rewards (EXP and dungeon drops).
accessing-dungeon-lore: Enter the dungeon in this area and engage in battle. By completing challenges, you will earn rewards such as EXP, dungeon drops, and random quests.
scavenge-for-supplies-in-the-wasteland-n: Scavenge for supplies in the wasteland near this area
Venture beyond the platform and explore the nearby wasteland—you might uncover supplies left behind.
battle-the-nearby-enemies-lore: The supply-deprived shield has become fragile and can hardly stop the wasteland monsters from entering the station. Will you fight them?
city-actions-lore: Before entering a dungeon or engaging in battle, make sure you are fully prepared. On the Disc > Team screen, assemble a team of 3 heroes for deployment, and don’t forget to craft armor in the Molecular Assembler to properly equip your fighters. Fight carefully—if all 3 heroes collapse from exhaustion, you will die, losing 16% of your Memory, 8% of your Cache, and 3 random items.
farming-in-abandoned-carnival-bar: Farming Near Area Abandoned Carnival Bar
farming-in-plundered-national-bank: Farming Near Area Plundered National Bank

scavenging-in-the-resting-place-of-a-res: Scavenging Near Area The Resting Place of a Researcher Who Held Fast to the Law of AI Relations
progress-had-been-speed-up-for: Progress had been speed up for
medical-technology-parts-lore: Precision assembly parts manufactured in advanced medical technology factories. They can be used to craft signal tuning devices or dismantled for tech fragments.
in-depth-exploration-of-the-wasteland-ne: In-Depth Exploration of The Wasteland Near
normal-dungeon-lore: Dungeons near the station are shielded by protective barriers. Enemy units here are lower in level, offering moderate difficulty and balanced experience gains—perfect for newcomers to explore.
challenge-dungeon-lore: Dungeons far from the station lie fully exposed in the wastelands. Enemy units are immensely powerful, but yield 2.0× experience. Recommended only after reaching the station’s maximum level—this is no place for cowards.
battle-nodes-not-implemented-yet: Battle nodes are not implemented yet
select-dungeon-visibility: Select whether this dungeon is public or private
public-dungeon-hint: A room code will be automatically generated for public dungeons
normal-dungeon-description: Exploration Dungeon: 5-8 layers, 12-18 nodes, moderate difficulty (1.0x enemy level)
challenge-dungeon-description: Challenge Dungeon: 7-10 layers, 17-28 nodes, high difficulty (1.5x enemy level)
lore-node-hint: Visit to read a dungeon record. This node does not advance the layer.
dungeon-completed-hint: You can click the 'Leave Dungeon' button below to exit
vote-timeout-warning: If this vote times out, the dungeon will be disbanded.
vote-timeout-disbanded: Vote timed out. The dungeon has been disbanded.
error-vote-in-progress: A vote is already in progress.
error-only-leader-can-explore: Only the leader can explore nodes.
error-only-leader-can-start-battle: Only the leader can start the battle.
error-only-leader-can-start-vote: Only the leader can start a vote.
error-only-leader-can-kick: Only the leader can kick members.
error-vote-not-allowed: You are not allowed to vote.
error-vote-mismatch: Vote does not match the target.
error-selected-hero-not-in-team: Selected hero is not in the team.
error-battle-in-progress: A battle is already in progress.
error-skill-repeat-limit-reached: This skill has reached its usage limit for this battle.
error-already-in-dungeon: You are already in this dungeon.
city-battle-reward-hint: City battle rewards are 50% of normal rewards
error-node-not-in-current-layer: This node is not in the current layer. Complete current layer first!
error-node-already-completed: This node has already been completed!
error-user-not-in-network: You are not in a terminal user network. Join or create a network to use support heroes.
error-insufficient-node-points: Insufficient node points. Your network needs at least 1 node point to use support heroes.
error-support-hero-not-found: Support hero not found or is not available in your network.
support-hero-will-be-selected-when-enter: You will select a support hero when entering the dungeon. (Costs 1 Node Point)
remove-one-hero-to-use-support-hero: Remove one hero from your team to enable support hero feature. (Team size will be 2 + 1 support hero)
support-hero-disabled-team-full: Support hero feature has been disabled because your team is now full (3 heroes).
no-support-hero-selected: No support hero selected. Click below to select one.
team-required: You must have exactly 3 heroes in your team
log-target-gained-revive: {{targetName}} gained revive protection for {{duration}} turns ({{revivePercent}}% HP)
the-heros-attributes-will-grow-as-you-le: The hero's attributes will grow as you level up.
fatal-injury-repairing-neural-connection: Fatal injury detected. Repairing neural connection
confirm-exit-battle: Are you sure you want to exit the battle? A random hero will die as penalty!
enemy-text: Enemy summon flag, interact with it using any of your heroes to start a battle.
common-loot-text: Common loot gacha pool, interact with it using any of your heroes to obtain loot.
rare-loot-text: Rare loot gacha pool, interact with it using any of your heroes to obtain loot.
legendary-loot-text: Legendary loot gacha pool, interact with it using any of your heroes to obtain loot.
large-ap-spell-text: Powerful AP restoration spell, interact with it using any of your heroes to restore AP (+3).
normal-ap-spell-text: AP restoration spell, interact with it using any of your heroes to restore AP (+1).
large-hp-spell-text: Powerful HP restoration spell, interact with it using any of your heroes to restore team HP (+512).
normal-hp-spell-text: HP restoration spell, interact with it using any of your heroes to restore hero HP (+256).
show-card-details-hint: When enabled, the first click on a card will display its effects
not-in-network: You are not in any terminal user network
confirm-leave-network: Are you sure you want to leave this network?
create-network-notice: Creating a network requires Level 10 and costs 4 Cache
name-and-short-name-required: Name and short name are required
short-name-max-3-chars: Short name must be max 3 characters
confirm-change-role: Are you sure you want to change this member's role?
confirm-kick-member: Are you sure you want to kick this member
invite-code-notice: Generate an invite code to invite new members. Each code can only be used once.
invite-permission-required: Only admins can generate invite codes
invite-step-2: Share the code with the person you want to invite
invite-step-3: They can join by entering the code in the Join Network page
cannot-create-invite-warning: You cannot create a new invite code while there are unused codes. Please wait for existing codes to be used.
support-heroes-notice: Set up to 2 heroes as support. Network members can use them in dungeons (costs 1 Node Point per run).
max-2-support-heroes: You can only set up to 2 support heroes
error-already-given-prestige-today: You have already given prestige today
confirm-upgrade-stall-message: Are you sure you want to upgrade your stall?
agent-workstation-compute-unit-lore: A highly valuable component obtainable only by progressing through the story mode. It is used to upgrade the Agent Workstation, allowing you to deploy more agents on missions simultaneously.
solidified-trade-data-stream-lore: A highly solidified block of trade data, used as a required material for Memory Orders and delivered when fulfilling those orders.
advanced-cache-data-lore: A high-grade cache data unit of immeasurable value. It is the designated material for Cache Orders and is required when fulfilling and delivering those orders.
agent-workstation-lore: A specialized facility where agents can be deployed to various workstations. Manage power, trade orders, manufacturing, and more.
agent-workstation-init-hint: Initialize your Agent Workstation to begin deploying agents.
upgrade-workstation-confirm: Upgrading the workstation requires 1 Agent Workstation Compute Unit. Continue?
workstation-power-plant-section: Nuclear Power Plants - Generate power hourly; upgrades increase output
workstation-contact-center-section: Contact Centers - Obtain clues every 8 hours; upgrades reduce cooldown
workstation-manufacturing-station-sectio: Manufacturing Stations - Craft materials for orders
workstation-rest-room-section: Agent Rest Rooms - Restore agent mood
workstation-super-terminal-section: Super Terminal - Stationed agents buff all other agents
assign-agent-to-operate: Deploy at least one agent to operate this facility
agent-mood-empty-hint: All stationed agents are exhausted. Send them to the Rest Room to recover mood.
power-plant-upgrade-core-lore: A specialized core used to upgrade Nuclear Power Plants.
trading-hub-expansion-chip-lore: A chip used to expand Trading Station capacity.
contact-center-amplifier-lore: An amplifier to enhance Contact Center efficiency.
manufacturing-precision-tool-lore: A tool used to upgrade Manufacturing Stations.
rest-room-comfort-module-lore: A module to improve Agent Rest Room recovery.
power-surge-description: Increases power recovery by 15% when stationed at a Power Plant.
clue-insight-description: Gains an additional 1 clue per collection.
mood-healer-description: Increases mood recovery by 30% in Rest Rooms.
trade-master-description: Adds 1 extra order slot to Trading Stations.
memory-specialist-description: Reduces material cost by 20% when crafting Solidified Trade Data Stream.
perfect-construction-description: Reduces manufacturing time by up to 20% when crafting upgrade cores.
bargaining-description: Reduces manufacturing time by up to 20% when crafting Solidified Trade Data Stream.
cache-expert-description: Reduces manufacturing time by up to 5% when crafting Advanced Cache Data.
cannot-remove-agent-orders-in-progress: Cannot remove agent while orders are in progress. Wait for orders to complete or cancel them first.
error-cannot-remove-agent-orders-in-prog: Cannot remove agent with orders in progress
error-no-agent-assigned: No agent assigned to this slot
manufacturing-hint: Select a recipe to start manufacturing
assign-agent-to-collect: Assign an agent to collect clues
power-plant-info: Power plants generate power over time when agents are assigned.
rest-room-info: Agents in rest rooms recover mood over time.
super-terminal-info: Super terminal agents provide bonuses to all agents.
trading-station-info: Trading stations execute orders to obtain resources. Upgrading increases order slot capacity.
manufacturing-station-info: Manufacturing stations craft various items. Upgrading increases manufacturing slot capacity.
upgrade-confirm-hint: Confirm to upgrade this slot? The required materials will be consumed.
assist-investigation-hint: Accept Info Trade orders to help with investigations
classified-intel-hint: Accept Classified Convoy orders to trade classified intelligence
no-compute-unit: No Agent Workstation Compute Unit available
cache-capacity-hint: Select how much local storage cache is allowed to use.
cache-capacity-clear-first: Clear cache data to unlock smaller capacities.
reduce-transparency-hint: Turn off blur effects for a crisper, less transparent UI.
terminal-app-position-hint: Adjust the floating launcher offset to avoid covering content.
ui-scale-hint: Adjust the overall interface size. You can change it anytime.
text-shadow-scale-hint: Adjust text shadow intensity. You can change it anytime.
interface-scale-description: Choose a scale suitable for this device. You can adjust it later in Settings > Visual.
interface-scale-hint: This affects text and spacing across the interface.
visual-effect-description: Choose the UI scale and text shadow strength for this device. You can adjust them later in Settings > Visual.
visual-effect-hint: These settings affect layout size and text glow.
text-shadow-description: Choose a text shadow strength suitable for this device. You can adjust it later in Settings > Visual.
text-shadow-hint: This affects text glow and readability.
preferred-trading-strategy-hint: Applied automatically when opening the trading station.
workstation-init-required: Initialize the Agent Workstation before editing this option.
trading-station-required: Build a Trading Station to unlock trading strategies.
use-support-hero-hint: Reserve a support hero slot for teams and dungeons when available.
support-hero-requires-network: Join a Terminal User Network to enable support heroes.
reset-preferences-hint: Clear local settings and restore defaults.
arcane-pulse-description: Discharge condensed arcane energy to strike a single target.
temporal-guard-description: Bend time to hasten allies and raise their evasion.
ether-bind-description: Bind foes with ether chains, dealing damage and slowing them.
solar-burst-description: Radiant blast that damages all foes and heals allies slightly.
dawn-sanctuary-description: Sanctuary of light that shields and cleanses allies.
corona-shield-description: Flare shield that boosts magic defense and heals a target.
azure-hymn-description: Soothing hymn that restores HP and speeds an ally.
purity-surge-description: Cleanse all allies and lift their magic defense.
winged-oath-description: Angelic oath that heals the team and raises evasion.
quake-hammer-description: Smash the ground, damaging all foes and lowering their physical defense.
bastion-stand-description: Brace yourself with a shield and higher physical defense.
grit-wave-description: Rouse the squad with attack buffs and AP restore.
void-lance-description: Pierce a target with concentrated void energy.
shadow-barrier-description: Shroud allies to boost evasion and magic defense.
entropy-mark-description: Brand a foe to sap magic defense, then strike.
storm-cycle-description: Cycling winds strike all foes and slow them.
ion-carve-description: Ionized slash that damages and reduces physical defense.
gale-step-description: Swift step gaining an extra turn and evasion.
frost-bloom-description: Icy burst that damages and slows a foe.
crystalline-wall-description: Raise a crystal barrier to shield and bolster magic defense.
serene-echo-description: Gentle heal that also lifts evasion briefly.
spirit-chain-description: Bind an enemy, dealing damage and slowing.
phantom-step-description: Phase step that grants evasion and another action.
wail-of-ashes-description: Ashen scream hitting all foes and lowering magic defense.
ember-thread-description: Heal and empower an ally’s physical attack.
radiant-tether-description: Link allies to heal and raise magic attack.
flare-guard-description: Firelit guard that shields allies and boosts evasion slightly.
tidal-cut-description: Wave-like slash for burst physical damage.
bubble-screen-description: Water barrier shielding allies and speeding them up.
current-shift-description: Slow enemies and refresh allies’ AP.
shrapnel-arc-description: Scattershot damaging all foes and lowering physical defense.
barricade-boost-description: Fortify yourself with shield and defense.
overheat-purge-description: Cleanse and heal yourself after overheat.
windward-step-description: Step into the wind for speed and evasion.
skyshield-description: Single-target shield with a speed boost.
verdant-pulse-description: Heal the team and lift physical attack.
shelter-leaf-description: Leaf guard granting evasion to one ally.
bone-break-description: Heavy hit that also shreds physical defense.
cannibalize-grit-description: Consume will to heal and boost attack.
slag-throw-description: Toss molten slag for solid damage.
furnace-skin-description: Harden skin with heat, gaining shields and defense.
ember-dash-description: Dash through with an extra turn and speed.
starlit-resonance-description: Starlit melody healing allies and boosting magic attack.
mist-guard-description: Mist shield for defense and evasion.
renewal-wave-description: Wave of recovery healing allies and cleansing wounds.
adrenaline-net-description: Snare foes while fueling your momentum.
radiant-veil-description: Veil of light shielding and healing allies.
seraphic-charge-description: Holy charge striking foes with radiant power.
chorus-of-light-description: Harmonic light that heals and buffs the team.
bulwark-drive-description: Drive forward with reinforced guard and shield.
plasma-wall-description: Erect a plasma barrier to defend allies.
guardian-roar-description: Roar to draw fire and bolster defenses.
astral-step-description: Astral blink granting speed and evasion.
void-bastion-description: Void fortress shielding allies from harm.
redeem-code-hint: Enter your redeem code. Rewards will be delivered to your inbox.
redeem-success-check-inbox: Redeemed successfully. Check your items inbox to claim.
client-outdated-pending-patch: Outdated client. Waiting for server patch delivery.
second-wind-description: Revives fallen allies and restores a small amount of AP, giving the team a brief second chance.
deep-healing-description: Heals a single ally based on your max HP, restoring a solid amount of health.
reinforced-armor-description: Grants a shield and boosts physical defense to one ally, greatly reducing incoming damage for a short time.
story-mode-lore: Step into the past of Terminal Ark and experience the city's origins and secrets.
chapter-locked: This chapter is not yet unlocked
reward-sent-to-inbox: Reward has been sent to your item inbox
cache-warning-hint: You can clear cache in Settings to free up space.
clear-cache-category-hint: Click to clear specific cache category. You can also clear all caches at once below.
log-target-stunned: {{targetName}} may be stunned ({{chance}}% chance) for {{duration}} turns
error-no-acceleration-needed: No acceleration needed - already ready to collect
cache-all-aditional: All caches except preferences and read notifications
username-must-be-1-16-chars-and-alphanum: Username must be 1-16 characters long and alphanumeric.
username-change-rule: Only letters and numbers, up to 16 characters.
broadcast-global-buff: Player {{player}} used {{item}}, all players will receive {{effect}} ({{value}})
error-no-active-afk-players: No active AFK players on the server. Overclocking unavailable.
tutorial-step-1a-body: Tap the smartphone icon to open the terminal menu.
tutorial-step-1c-body: Select the beginner login pack and claim it.
tutorial-step-2-body: Tap “Signal Hijack System” to open the gacha.
tutorial-step-4-body: You received 20 pulls—use 10 first and claim the rewards.
tutorial-step-gacha-protocol-hint: Tap the screen to initiate Signal Hijack.
tutorial-step-5-body: Go to the inventory and tap “Claim”.
tutorial-step-6a-body: Back in Signal Hijack System, select “Standard Channel” again.
tutorial-step-6b-body: Do another 10-pull and claim the rewards to finish all 20 pulls.
tutorial-step-9-tip-2: Guardians/Defenders tank damage; Strikers/Specials deal damage
tutorial-step-9-tip-3: Supports heal or buff the team
tutorial-step-12-body: Choose “Lower Deck Outskirts of Terminal Ark” (Lv.0–16).
tutorial-step-15-body: Pick the option with fewer enemies to start.
tutorial-attribute-rule-1: Only two attributes exist: Physical and Magic.
tutorial-attribute-rule-2: Skill text color: white = Physical, gray = Magic.
tutorial-attribute-rule-3: Enemy name color: white = Physical, gray = Magic.
tutorial-attribute-rule-4: Physical heroes are reduced by Physical Defense vs physical enemies and are usually better vs magic enemies; magic heroes are reduced by Magic Defense vs magic enemies and are usually better vs physical enemies.
tutorial-refresh-enemy-tip: Close and reopen this window to refresh enemies.
tutorial-step-16-body: Tap a card to use it on enemies. Watch AP cost.
tutorial-ap-tip: Cards turn dim when AP is insufficient.
tutorial-step-17-body: After the battle, here are a few recommended next steps:
error-feedback-hint: Describe the issue and steps to reproduce. This will be sent as a private message.
error-feedback-description: Describe the error or issue you encountered:
admin-title-format-hint: Format: lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens (e.g., vip-member, beta-tester)
network-node-contribution-lore: Consume a Network Node Key to add node points to your network.
enhance-network-ddos-protection-lore: Available Tuesday to Friday. Consumes a Neural Network Firewall Node to increase DDoS Protection.
ddos-network-attack-lore: Weekend-only. Only networks ranked in the top 3 for DDoS Protection may participate.
error-must-be-network-member: You must be a member of a terminal user network to perform this AFK.
error-network-ranking-too-low: Your network ranking is too low for this operation.
error-afk-not-available-today: This AFK operation is not available today.
neural-network-firewall-node-lore: A firewall node used to reinforce a terminal user network's DDoS protection.
leave-dungeon-confirmation: Are you sure you want to leave the dungeon?
error-team-must-have-two-heroes: When using a support hero, your team must have 2 heroes.
tutorial-skip-confirm-line-1: To help you understand the game better, skipping the tutorial is not recommended.
tutorial-skip-confirm-line-2: Once skipped, this guide cannot be opened again.
tutorial-step-17-line-1: Play Story Mode to learn the world and the protagonists’ stories. You can also obtain the key item “{{itemName}}” to unlock the Agent Workstation and earn offline income.
tutorial-step-17-line-2: Keep playing City Mode to explore dungeons, earn rich rewards, and experiment with hero and equipment builds.
tutorial-step-17-line-3: Remember to level up heroes and equip them—dungeons are dangerous.
tutorial-step-17-line-4: Send a message in global chat and ask if any Terminal User Networks accept newcomers. After joining, you can borrow support heroes from the same network and exchange info in network chat.
tutorial-step-17-line-6: Chat is a key part of the game—don’t worry, speak up in the public channel.
tutorial-step-17-line-5: Welcome to the world of “Terminal Ark”.
error-status-busy: Neural connection overloaded. Unable to perform this action.
error-feedback-thank-you: Thank you for your feedback. Our team will review it.
server-busy-retry-hint: Server is busy, please try again later
